id: Balance OS | Integrated GTD, PARA & Goal Setting Notion Template
name: Balance OS | Integrated GTD, PARA & Goal Setting Notion Template
description: With interconnected GTD, PARA, and Goal Setting templates, this ALL-IN life Management SYSTEM is meant to help you organize and align all the different areas of your life.Have you ever been so overwhelmed by all your tasks that you were unsure where to even start? What about your personal and professional goals? Your side hustles and all the ideas floating around in your head?This template takes full advantage of the automatic and relating features Notion has to connect and organize everythingâ€”y
features: Saying goodbye to procrastination!; Taking control of your life and unlocking your full potential by staying on track with all your life areas, projects, and goals!; Keeping a thorough database of everything useful you want to remember!; Finding balance, clarity, and peace of mind amongst the juggling act that is life. Don't feel overwhelmed by tasks!; Freelancers, students, or anyone who wants to manage personal or professional projects and goals!
